title: Usuzumizakura: Garo
synopsis: Set during the Heian Period, Kyo is a beautiful city that is proud of its glory. Two beautiful onmyouji meet, and the sad and short-lived beautiful cherry blossom starts to stir after 1000 years.
characters: ['Akira', 'Raikou', 'Kintoki', 'Seimei', 'Tokimaru', 'Fujiwara no, Yasusuke', 'Fujiwara no, Michinaga', 'Takeru', 'Tenko', 'Minamoto no, Yorinobu']
voices: ['Tanaka, Atsuko', 'Nakayama, Masei', 'Yajima, Akiko', 'Park, Romi', 'Higashi, Keisuke', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Horiuchi, Kenyuu', 'Seki, Tomokazu', 'Nakata, Jouji', 'Nomura, Katsuhito']
staff: [['Nishimura, Satoshi', ['Director']], ['Kubo, Souichirou', ['Sound Director']], ['Kobayashi, Yasuko', ['Script']], ['Katsura, Masakazu', ['Original Character Design']]]
